text: The Kyrgyzstan Futsal League, is the top league for Futsal in Kyrgyzstan. The winning team obtains the participation right to the AFC Futsal Club Championship. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" !Season ! ! ! |- |2007 |ATF Bishkek | | |- |2008 |AUB Bishkek | | |- |2009 |ATF Bishkek |AUB Altyn Tash Bishkek |Nalogovik Bishkek |- |2010 |Nalogovik Bishkek |AUB Altyn Tash Bishkek |Adilet Bishkek |- |2011 |Nalogovik Bishkek |Spartak Batken |Khimik Kara-Balta |} ==References== * Futsal Kyrgyzstan * Nalogovik champion (Russian) * Futsal * Kyrgyz Futsal futsal Kyrgyzstan Category:Futsal in Kyrgyzstan Category:Sports leagues established in 2007 it:Campionato di calcio del Kirghizistan pl:I liga kirgiska w piłce nożnej
title: Kyrgyzstan Futsal League
